author: case

comments.content: Thx in advance = Thanks in advance.
I suspect, however, that either Nick Curtis or Steve Jackaman will never be lonely again...

Now _that_ is a wikkid website. Furthermore here you can genuinely say you visit the site "for the interviews" ;^) as it looks like they interview all the right people: the right politics, the right movies, the right music bands and so on...

The art nouveau flavor of Arnold Bocklin is similar.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/arnold-bocklin/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315014522/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/arnold-bocklin/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/arnold-bocklin/")

(I never thought I'd recommend or even mention that typeface favorably to anyone, anywhere. )

_I never thought I’d recommend or even mention that typeface favorably to anyone, anywhere._

Hahahaha, I know the feeling! Though I must say I have seen it used well, notably pink on white on a CD-cover which had hand-drawn portraits on it. It was from the portfolio of a Typophile, but by the life of me I can't remember who it was...
